delete_api_key_text: PTERO TESTAre you sure you wish to delete this API key? All requests using it will immediately be invalidated and will fail.
no_api_keys_exist: PTERO TESTNo API keys exist for this account.
2fa_required_text: PTERO TESTYour account must have two-factor authentication enabled in order to continue.
new_api_key_text: PTERO TESTThe API key you have requested is shown below. Please store this in a safe location, it will not be shown again.
no_others_server: PTERO TESTThere are no other servers to display.
no_own_server: PTERO TESTThere are no servers associated with your account.
2fa_currently_enabled: PTERO TESTTwo-factor authentication is currently enabled on your account.
2fa_currently_disabled: PTERO TESTYou do not currently have two-factor authentication enabled on your account. Click the button below to begin configuring it.
description_text: PTERO TESTA description of this API key.
allowed_ips_text: PTERO TESTLeave blank to allow any IP address to use this API key, otherwise provide each IP address on a new line.
need_current_password: PTERO TESTYou must provide your current password in order to continue.
disable_2fa_text: PTERO TESTIn order to disable two-factor authentication you will need to provide your account password.
need_authentication_code: PTERO TESTYou must provide an authentication code to continue.
auth_code_digits: PTERO TESTAuthenticator code must be 6 digits.
2fa_enabled_text1: PTERO TESTTwo-factor authentication has been enabled on your account. Should you loose access to this device you'll need to use on of the codes displayed below in order to access your account.
2fa_enabled_text2: PTERO TESTThese codes will not be displayed again.
2fa_enabled_text3: PTERO TESTPlease take note of them now by storing them in a secure repository such as a password manager.
2fa_code_text: PTERO TESTEnter the code from your authenticator device after scanning the QR image.
email_updated: PTERO TESTYour Email Address has been updated.
password_confirmation_not_match: PTERO TESTPassword confirmation does not match the password you entered.
new_password_description: PTERO TESTYour new password should be at least 8 characters in length and unique to this website.
search_min_characters: PTERO TESTPlease enter at least three characters to begin searching.
search_description: PTERO TESTEnter a server name, uuid, or allocation to begin searching.
